field.name: $viewerTags
field.viewer: <> {_t('Contract')} {contractId && - {contractId} } {versionNumber > 0 && - {versionNumber}} {contractTypeSelect == 1 && {_t('Billing')}} {contractTypeSelect == 2 && {_t('Framework')}} {targetTypeSelect == 1 && {_t('Customer')}} {targetTypeSelect == 2 && {_t('Supplier')}} {targetTypeSelect == 3 && {_t('YEB/YER Customer')}} {targetTypeSelect == 4 && {_t('YEB/YER Supplier')}} {statusSelect == 1 && {_t('Draft')}} {statusSelect == 2 && {_t('Active')}} {statusSelect == 3 && {_t('Closed')}}

button.name: copyFromTemplateBtn
button.title: Use this template
button.prompt: Do you really wish to fill your contract based on this template ?

field.name: currentContractVersion
field.viewer:
<>
            <Box mt={2} fontWeight="bold">{_t('Initial ex tax total per year')}</Box>
            <Box fontWeight="bold" fontSize={4}>{contract.currency.symbol}{parseFloat(initialExTaxTotalPerYear).toFixed(contract.currency.numberOfDecimals)}</Box>
            {contract.isToRevaluate && <Box borderTop borderColor="inherit" m={1}/>}
            {contract.isToRevaluate && <Box mt={2} fontWeight="bold">{_t('Yearly ex tax total revalued')}</Box>}
            {contract.isToRevaluate && <Box fontWeight="bold" fontSize={4}>{contract.currency.symbol}{parseFloat(yearlyExTaxTotalRevalued).toFixed(contract.currency.numberOfDecimals)}</Box>}
          </>

field.name: currentContractVersion
field.viewer: <> <Box mt={2} fontWeight="bold">{_t('Total invoiced amount')}</Box> <Box fontWeight="bold" fontSize={4}>{contract.currency.symbol}{parseFloat(totalInvoicedAmount).toFixed(contract.currency.numberOfDecimals)}</Box> <Box borderTop borderColor="inherit" m={1}/> <Box mt={2} fontWeight="bold">{_t('Total paid amount')}</Box> <Box fontWeight="bold" fontSize={4}>{contract.currency.symbol}{parseFloat(totalPaidAmount).toFixed(contract.currency.numberOfDecimals)}</Box> </>

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self IS NULL AND :company member of self.companySet"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isCustomer IS TRUE AND :company member of self.companySet"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isSupplier IS TRUE AND :company member of self.companySet"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isCustomer = true AND :company member of self.companySet"

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isSupplier = true AND :company member of self.companySet"

alert.message: Attention the contract will have as starting date the provisional activation date ${currentContractVersion.supposedActivationDate}, Are you sure?

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " :company member of self.companySet AND (self.isProspect = true OR self.isCustomer = true) "

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " :company member of self.companySet AND self.isSupplier = true "
